alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 3:44PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Custer, northwestern Blaine and northwestern Butte Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Mackay Reservoir to near Ketchum. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, half inch hail and locally heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Rainfall rates approaching one quarter inch in under one hour reported via observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hailey, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Mackay, Grouse, Mackay Reservoir, Little Wood Reservoir, Bellevue, Gannett, Darlington, Chilly Barton Flat, Moore, Garfield Ranger Station, Copper Basin Airport, Mt Borah and Twin Bridges Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
